body.name: KOCH SYSTEME CS 11" Grey Non stick Granite Stone Frying Pan with Lid, Toxin-free Granite Nonstick Coating Cookware, Ultra Nonstik Skillet with Stainless Steel Handle, Oven Safe&All Stovetop Compatible

byLineInfo.name: Visit the KOCH SYSTEME CS Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 1 min
features: 【Ultra Nonstick Frying Pan with Lid】: With Titanium interior is scratch-resistant that enhances both durability and usage experience. Everything will just slides right off the truly nonstick surface for optimum cooking. Food-grade quality multilayer bottom which ensures rapid and even heat conduction.

【Heat Mastery Frying Pan System】: This 11'' fry pan is made of forged aluminum alloy that conducts heat quickly and evenly with precise temperature control. The 3 mm-thick body makes this pan durable and anti-warping. Provided with the heat conduction base technology, the food will be heat quickly.

【Stone-Derived Coating & Less Oil】: KOCH SYSTEME CS nonstick frying pan utilizes German-designed stone-derived coating, which is free of PTFE and PFOA. Unlike traditional skillets, it allows you to cook with less oil or butter. Ideals for over low to medium heat with less oil or butter for healthy diet. Oven safe up to 450°F!

【Outstanding Quality & Easy to clean】: The frying pans set is anti-warping and scratch-resistant that enhances both durability and usage experience. Whether it's an egg, steak, or muffin, it's easy to clean and you can say goodbye to the annoying burning food which sticking to the pans.

【Ergonomic Stainless Steel Handle】: The stainless steel handle of this stir-fry pan with ergonomic design, which stays cool and allows you to easily grip and maneuver the pan when cooking. The handle can stand high-temperature cooking and its oven-safe. This nonstick frying pan is ideal for frying fillets, steak and eggs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KOCH SYSTEME CS’S BRAND STORY KOCH SYSTEME CS was found in the 1980s as a kitchenware brand of Carl Schmidt Sohn GmbH, in Solingen, Germany. Building on Carl Schmidt Sohn GmbH’s experience in the development of knives and cutlery since 1829, KOCH SYSTEME CS has been expanding into further kitchenware product categories with focus on flatware and cookware that perfectly meet the needs of our customers. KOCH SYSTEME CS core product lines are characterized by utility and economy. KOCH SYSTEME CS’s products are distributed worldwide through our branches in Los Angeles and Hong Kong. KOCH SYSTEME CS’s long-standing brand name and its sizeable loyal customer base together represent a very attractive opportunity to further strengthen our position on the world.

EASY TO CLEAN Provided with the non-stick coating, you just need to wipe the surface with a cloth. And these nonstick pans are not available for dishwashers because of the abrasive cleaners! Hand washing with mild detergent and warm water is more recommended. HEATS QUICKLY & EVENLY This granite stir fry pan is made of forged aluminum alloy that conducts heat quickly and evenly with precise temperature control. Food will be heated quickly and evenly on this frying skillet. Moreover, this skillet can be used on stovetops including gas, induction, electric, ceramic, glass. Ergonomic Stainless-steel Handle KOCH SYSTEME CS pan is designed with an ergonomic handle that is easy to grip and maneuver. The handle can stand high temperature and stays cool while cooking. Oven safe up to 450℉, ideal for stir-frying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality; non-stick works great. More heavy duty than others we have used. Lid fits perfectly. We would buy again… but I don’t think we would need to!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little pan!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted an 8 inch pan mainly for eggs with a lid. I am very please, it's light weight and very easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and value
reviews.reviewText: I love this pan. It sits on my stove bc I use it for something everyday. The non stick quality is the best I've ever had. It doesn't chip or scratch. I try to always grab non metal cooking utensils when cooking but sometimes I just need the utensil closest to me. Even then it doesn't harm the finish. I bought the larger pan after trying a smaller version which I also love and used everyday. But some recipes just called for a larger cooking space. I am very happy with my purchase. Easy to heat, clean, and I would recommend to a friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good wok but the handle gets hot
reviews.reviewText: Good unstick wok but the handle gets hot. Not convinient to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Deep (like a Wok)
reviews.reviewText: This pan was purchased to replace a handle-less non-stick pan. This pan distributes heat evenly, cleans like a breeze, and seems sturdy. It is deeper than I expected, but works great for sauteeing vegetables and making quick sauces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This pan is easy to clean and seems to have a nice non-stick finish, but it is very light weight and you have to turn the heat up quite high, at least on an induction stove, to get the pan hot enough. Feels cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best non-stick pans EVER
reviews.reviewText: I have had this pan (and the smaller version) for about two years now (was given as a gift). I normally do not feel so compelled to write a review sooo far from purchase but this was an exception. They STILL are so non-stick after two years! Nothing sticks to them! Food just slides off of them and I have never had to scrub very hard. Every day I worry, one day, their magic will fade but that day has yet to come!The only thing food sometimes sticks to is the three little bolt attachments however, food normally quickly comes off after some scrubbing. The only slight issue with these is that the lid handle comes loose quite often—a little annoying but the handle never fully comes off.Overall, I would buy these over and over again if I needed to but, two years in, and they still work like new!
Very easy to clean, not sticky at all even when cooking some really sticky food. The pan is light, easy to hold with one hand.
Excelente para cocinar!!!Se lava super fácil y quiero tooodoooos los artículos de esta marca!!!Ya le regale a mi hermano y mi mamá también compró!
Es muy práctico y muy buena relación calidad-precio. Se limpia muy fácil.
Very lightweight but solid. Nothing sticks to it. Very satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente cocción de carnes 3 pulgadas en 5 a 7 minutos bien caliente el sartén.
